definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
to receive (praise, an education, punishment etc)/to be ...ed (praised, educated, punished etc)
to enjoy/to live it up/pleasure/CL:種|种[zhong3]
to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
to accept to hear a case/to handle (a service)
disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
to receive in no small measure

sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽视或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: Thy Lord knows best, and He has the clouds and the sun at His disposal. --Selected.
sentences.chinese: 你的主无所不知，云和太阳，都受他的使唤与调节。

sentences.english: Event throughput is bound by the server speed.
sentences.chinese: 事件吞吐量受服务器的速度限制。

sentences.english: The utility model thoroughly solves the wind-proof problem and the slide-proof problem; heavy equipment can not be damaged by the utility model.
sentences.chinese: 彻底解决了防风抗滑问题，保住重大设备不受损失。

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球变暖影响，青藏高原气候呈现出暖干趋势。

sentences.english: They dishonored her so much that she turned from them in disgust.
sentences.chinese: 她受玷污之后，遂即厌弃了他们。

sentences.english: Which wise men have told from their fathers, and have not hid it
sentences.chinese: 就是智慧人从列祖所受，传说而不隐瞒的。

sentences.english: Censorship of printed and audiovisual media.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸的印刷媒体和视听媒体均受政府监控。

sentences.english: Teachers in schools have been rubbished for the last ten years.
sentences.chinese: 过去十年学校教师一直受抨击。

sentences.english: She was much looked up to for her kindnesses .
sentences.chinese: 她因多行善事而受人尊敬。

sentences.english: A rebel force was beguiled into ambush.
sentences.chinese: 一支叛军受诱骗中了埋伏。

sentences.english: The bad police officer in that movie thought he was above the law.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影中的坏警察自认不受法律的约束。

sentences.english: Trademark registrants enjoy trademark rights and receive protection under law.
sentences.chinese: 商标注册人享有商标权，受法律保护。

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 战俘依然受军法约束，以及军人守则的道德指导。

sentences.english: But only 16 percent of workers in France said they had done so.
sentences.chinese: 但是这样的情况在受调查的法国员工中却只有16%。

sentences.english: The town was forced to yield after a long siege.
sentences.chinese: 该城受长期围困而被迫弃守。

definition: to receive (praise, an education, punishment etc)/to be ...ed (praised, educated, punished etc)
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
